WorkItem.Description:
this should not be the default behavior, why change the value of the attribute. 
I know the html standard is that attribute names are case insensitive, but today there is modern frameworks like Angular 2 who has crucial case sensitive attributes, otherwise it will throw a run time exception, the web is evolving, this is how it will be in the future, why shouldn't attributes contain higher case letters.
WorkItem.Summary: HtmlAttributeCollection changes attributes names to lowercase
